dct_title_s: Quam hic vides orbis imagine[m] lector ca[n]dide ea[m] vt posteriore[m] ita & eme[n]datiorem ijs que hactenus circu[m]ferebantur esse America sarmatiaq[ue] ac India testantur ...
dct_description_sm: Relief shown pictorially. A very close copy of the world map of Mercator, published in Louvain in 1538.
